outline:
1. region beyond or across, side
    1. region across or beyond
    2. side, opposite side
kjv_def: [idiom] against, beyond, by, [idiom] from, over, passage, quarter, (other, this) side, straight.
strongs_def: properly, a region across; but used only adverbially (with or without a preposition) on the opposite side (especially of the Jordan; ususally meaning the east)
